languages.text: {n}Жилистый мужчина в возрасте отрешенно наблюдает за суетой отсека, но взгляд его то и дело цепляется за кровавый символ, начертанный неподалеку. Тогда его лицо странно кривится, а ладони нервно сжимаются.{/n}

{n}A sinewy middle-aged man watches the bustle of the bay with a detached expression. Every so often, whenever his eyes linger on the blood mark inscribed nearby, his face changes strangely and his hands clench into fists.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Жилистый мужчина в возрасте отрешенно наблюдает за суетой отсека, но взгляд его то и дело цепляется за кровавый символ, начертанный неподалеку. Тогда его лицо странно кривится, а ладони нервно сжимаются.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un homme sinueux d'âge moyen observe l'agitation ambiante avec une expression détachée. De temps à autre, lorsque son regard s'attarde sur la marque sanglante tracée à proximité, vous remarquez son visage tressaillir et ses poings se refermer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A sinewy middle-aged man watches the bustle of the bay with a detached expression. Every so often, whenever his eyes linger on the blood mark inscribed nearby, his face changes strangely and his hands clench into fists.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un hombre fibroso de mediana edad observa el bullicio del compartimento con cara de desidia. De vez en cuando, cada vez que posa los ojos en la marca que se ha trazado con sangre cerca de allí, aprieta los puños con fuerza y su rostro adopta una expresión peculiar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A sinewy middle-aged man watches the bustle of the bay with a detached expression. Every so often, whenever his eyes linger on the blood mark inscribed nearby, his face changes strangely and his hands clench into fists.{/n}

languages.text: {n}筋肉質の中年男が、騒々しいベイを冷めた表情で眺めている。時折、近くに付いている血痕に視線を移しては、不思議な表情で両の拳を握り締めていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A sinewy middle-aged man watches the bustle of the bay with a detached expression. Every so often, whenever his eyes linger on the blood mark inscribed nearby, his face changes strangely and his hands clench into fists.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}筋肉質の中年男が、騒々しいベイを冷めた表情で眺めている。時折、近くに付いている血痕に視線を移しては、不思議な表情で両の拳を握り締めていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}一位体格壮硕的中年男子带着冷漠的表情看着甲板上的喧嚣。每隔一段时间，每当他的目光停留在附近的鲜血图案上，他的表情就会发生古怪的变化，双手紧紧攥成拳头。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A sinewy middle-aged man watches the bustle of the bay with a detached expression. Every so often, whenever his eyes linger on the blood mark inscribed nearby, his face changes strangely and his hands clench into fists.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一位体格壮硕的中年男子带着冷漠的表情看着甲板上的喧嚣。每隔一段时间，每当他的目光停留在附近的鲜血图案上，他的表情就会发生古怪的变化，双手紧紧攥成拳头。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein sehniger Mann mittleren Alters betrachtet das geschäftige Treiben in der Bucht mit teilnahmsloser Miene. Hin und wieder, wenn sein Blick auf das Blutzeichen in der Nähe fällt, verändert sich sein Ausdruck, und er ballt seine Hände zu Fäusten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A sinewy middle-aged man watches the bustle of the bay with a detached expression. Every so often, whenever his eyes linger on the blood mark inscribed nearby, his face changes strangely and his hands clench into fists.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Orta yaşlı, zayıf ama sıkı vücutlu, dalgın bir ifade takınmış bir adam; bölmedeki telaşı izliyor. Ara sıra gözü yakınındaki kanlı işarete ilişince yüzü tuhaf bir hâl alıyor ve yumruklarını sıkıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A sinewy middle-aged man watches the bustle of the bay with a detached expression. Every so often, whenever his eyes linger on the blood mark inscribed nearby, his face changes strangely and his hands clench into fists.{/n}
